This table define which columns are part of tuple returned by a query.

column.name: QUERY_COLUMN_ID
column.remarks: foreign key to the QUERY_COLUMN_PROTOTYPE this projection applies to

column.name: QUERY_MODEL_ID
column.remarks: foreign key to a QUERY_MODEL

column.name: LABEL
column.remarks: A label for this projected column. Will override the default label of the column prototype if non null.

column.name: PROJECTION_OPERATION
column.remarks: the operation applied to the column, if any.

column.name: PROJECTION_RANK
column.remarks: the order in which this projected column in the returned tuple.

column.name: CUF_ID
column.remarks: the custom field id for this projection column, if the referenced column is a custom field.

changeSet.comment: This table indicates which projected columns are aggregated on for a given query.

column.name: QUERY_MODEL_ID
column.remarks: foreign key to a QUERY_MODEL.

column.name: QUERY_COLUMN_ID
column.remarks: foreign key to the QUERY_COLUMN_PROTOTYPE which must be aggregated on

column.name: LABEL
column.remarks: A label for this projected column. Will override the default label of the column prototype if non null.

column.name: AGGREGATION_OPERATION
column.remarks: the operation applied to the column, if any.

column.name: AGGREGATION_RANK
column.remarks: the order in which this projected column in the returned tuple.

column.name: CUF_ID
column.remarks: the custom field id for this projection column, if the referenced column is a custom field.

changeSet.comment: This table defines the columns on which one want to filter the data.

column.name: QUERY_FILTER_ID
column.remarks: autogenerated ID

column.name: QUERY_COLUMN_ID
column.remarks: foreign key to a QUERY_COLUMN_PROTOTYPE

column.name: QUERY_MODEL_ID
column.remarks: foreign key to a QUERY_MODEL

column.name: FILTER_OPERATION
column.remarks: a comparison operator

column.name: CUF_ID
column.remarks: the custom field id for this filter column, if the referenced column is a custom field.

changeSet.comment: This table holds the values used by a QUERY_FILTER_COLUMN.

column.name: QUERY_FILTER_ID
column.remarks: foreign key to QUERY_FILTER_COLUMN

column.name: FILTER_VALUE
column.remarks: a value for this filter

changeSet.comment: This table indicates how the projected columns are ordered.

column.name: QUERY_MODEL_ID
column.remarks: foreign key to a QUERY_MODEL. Note that this is a denormalization : that value could be retrieved via the referenced projection column

column.name: QUERY_COLUMN_ID
column.remarks: foreign key to the QUERY_COLUMN_PROTOTYPE which must be ordered

column.name: ORDER_OPERATION
column.remarks: the operation applied to the column, if any. It must mirror the operation applied to the column they reference in the projection/aggregation clause.

column.name: ORDER_RANK
column.remarks: the order in which this ordering instruction must be treated.

column.name: ORDER_DIR
column.remarks: either ASC or DESC

column.name: CUF_ID
column.remarks: the custom field id for this filter column, if the referenced column is a custom field.
